item.title: Motorola’s budget Razr is even more affordable now that it’s $100 off
item.description: If you’ve been eyeing a flip phone but have been put off by the price, now’s your chance to snag one at a serious discount. Motorola’s latest Razr is currently matching its all-time low price of $599.
